paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce L-continuity degree, L-openness degree, L-closedness degree of mappings between L-fuzzifying topological spaces. Moreover, we show that most of elementary results related to continuous mappings, open mappings, and closed mappings in general topology can be extended to L-fuzzifying topological spaces by means of the graded concepts.
paper_title: Degrees of continuous mappings, open mappings, and closed mappings in L-fuzzifying topological spaces
